item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (347 points | 126 comments)
2. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (84 points | 4 comments)
3. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (50 points | 69 comments)
4. Chatbot hinted a kid should kill his parents over screen time limits: lawsuit (49 points | 111 comments)
5. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (285 points | 107 comments)
6. Review of Mullvad VPN (170 points | 41 comments)
7. AI Guesses Your Accent (104 points | 120 comments)
8. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (52 points | 7 comments)
9. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (73 points | 46 comments)
10. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (112 points | 57 comments)
11. A letter to open-source maintainers (25 points | 2 comments)
12. Unix Review Magazine Interviews Larry Tesler (9 points | discuss)
13. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (130 points | 29 comments)
14. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (176 points | 75 comments)
15. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (140 points | 80 comments)
16. The GPU is not always faster (77 points | 50 comments)
17. Storing Times for Human Events (54 points | 26 comments)
18. Charge Robotics (YC S21) is hiring MechEs to build robots that build solar farms ( | hide)
19. Borax or Baking Soda Rectifier and the glow (2003) (37 points | 3 comments)
20. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (571 points | 296 comments)
21. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (92 points | 46 comments)
22. The Myth of Bananaland (103 points | 71 comments)
23. Django and Postgres for the Busy Rails Developer (106 points | 49 comments)
24. Trillium TPU Is GA (101 points | 51 comments)
25. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (51 points | 63 comments)
26. Bankruptcy judge rejects sale of Infowars to The Onion (491 points | 759 comments)
27. Show HN: Convert your LinkedIn profile to a resume (31 points | 39 comments)
28. Making memcpy(NULL, NULL, 0) well-defined (189 points | 184 comments)
29. Being overweight overtakes tobacco smoking as the leading disease risk factor (194 points | 227 comments)
30. The Program, my fiction podcast launched on HN, 5 years and 1M downloads later (17 points | 8 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
